sentences.english: Factors influencing the electrical coagulation process of hematite and quartz are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了赤鐵礦和石英電凝聚過程的影響因素。

sentences.english: We can extract iron from haematite by heating it with carbon in a blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以把赤鐵礦和碳在鼓風爐內一起加熱來提取鐵。

sentences.english: Haematite is a special case of the more general ilmenite structure.
sentences.chinese: 赤鐵礦是更爲一般的鈦鐵礦型結構中一個特殊的情況。

sentences.english: Hematite is an iron oxide that is deep red in color.
sentences.chinese: 赤鐵礦是一種具有深紅顏色的氧化鐵。

sentences.english: Hematite was successfully removed from kaolinite by shear flocculation, when sodium oleate was used.
sentences.chinese: 採用剪切絮凝工藝，可有效脫除高嶺石中的赤鐵礦。
